title: Proof MSM Knew in Advance About Hawaii Terror Drill
text:
By Christopher Watson
Monday, January 15, 2018 21:16
 
 
a.) either the powers that be and their minions are absolute idiots
b.) they think we’re absolute idiots who will never be able to put two and two together
c.) they’re so brazen and believe they have such a monopoly on power that they don’t care what we think
d.) or a combination of all four
Here’s what I mean.  Check out this NBC news report on the Hawaii terror drill…

Jan 15, 2018, 11:46 pm
Nice catch my friend.
I think the most probable scenario is that the false missile alert is a deliberate way to force Hawaiians into a drill and to think very seriously about what they will actually do if a real missile is fired their way.
This was probably considered a better alternative to issuing public statements about impending danger and urging citizens to hold drills.  Though traumatizing, this first forced drill may lead to less panic when the real event happens, and to people having a better idea on how to react.  Though apathy is a danger, this strategy may save many lives despite it’s controversial nature.
Hawaiians should take this very seriously and prep.  Trump is likely going to act on NK soon, hence the drill.  This argument is also bolstered by the fact Japan had its own false alert.
You have been warned by your govt.

Anonymous
I think the most probable sceanerio is that the poor schmuck in Hawaii accidently put out the alert.  It’s why he got reassigned to another position.
Jan 16, 2018, 10:11 am
Hawaii is likely a prime target due to it’s closer distance to NK.  NK missiles reportedly have trouble with reentry into the atmosphere.  The shorter the distance, the less altitude required, hence Hawaii may be a reachable target without major reentry issues.

Everette
I am unable to watch the YouTube video , they have shut it off to both my computers . I guess I was telling people sights they need to go to prove my point in my commits to much  . Oh well the show must go on ! A lot of the commits made  is what I now draw from . I just want to put in my 2 cents worth . From the news videos Hawaii was not ready nor did the people have anywhere to hide ! It litterally freaked everyone out . Now after they have been scared to death maybe they will be preparing should diaper boy launch his new toys ! It’s a shame everything said is now questioned to the point it makes people so stupid that they just get to the point they do nothing . Well that’s exactually what happened in Hawaii . Most people don’t realize that their questioning is filled with negative seed words that once taken in it begins to grow and choke out the positive thoughts until the people become stupid and afraid to make a move for fear of being wrong . Fear of going in any direction . If Trump had ordered that drills were to be done , many would not have pertisapated in them and the news media would have made a circus out of it . How do you treat people with children’s minds ? Do exactually what they did ! Now their fear has shaken them back into reality ! War is coming , not if , but when ! A bully once confronted like diaper boy will back off , but will be looking for a open space when to throw his punch ! Good move Trump ! Now Hawaii is shaken back into reality ! Get your asses ready !!! China is arguing over Taiwan and the sea area that they say belongs to them . Diaper boy wants to be king of the hill . Now he is pulling a fast one trying to buddy up to South Korea . Hope they got more sense than that ! Look at how he treats his own people . Russia has now pulled up to the line , watching and waiting for what ? There use to be talk about the beast from the east ! Even Nastradomus had things to say about him . I believe I remember him saying he will send missiles into New York City . Why ? That is where most of our trade center offices  are . That seems to be the seat of our ecomony ! Diaper boy would be stupid not to nuke Hawaii to remove the Military base there that could launch counter strikes ! Once that is removed America would have to cross the ocean to get to him ! Can we get back to common sense and realize Trump is trying to prepare us for the evils Obama set us up for ! When Obama went out of office he had double cross Russia , Hillary made a statement that we were going to war with Russia . She to double crossed Russia . Remember she sold Urainium to them ! I also read that she sold nukes to diaper boy ! It’s time we get out of our drug stuppers , our I don’t care attitude , and our give me everything I want mentality and start getting ready for what is coming ! Even a child can see we are headed for war ! Obama weakened our country , mentally , physically and Spiritually . We are getting ready to fight major powers of the earth with world war 1 army . This ass cut up some of our battle ships and sold them for scrap . He grounded key fighting air craft and locked them up . He allowed the Enemy to bring their armies into our boarders of America . Russia now has 150,000 troops in America . The UN Muslims have who knows how many ? The Isis refugees are also within our countries boarders . Drug cartels from South America roam our streets . This jackass need to hang in front of the Capitol building . And the fake news media need to be right beside him ! Their  stupidity has created the ignorance we are now living with . Way  to go Trump ! I bet the Hawaiians are now making ready should a nuclear attack occur . Before they were setting ducks ! Only person I saw trying to think things out was th man letting down his daughter in the man hole ! Smart man ! Yet the news media , OH ! He was so scared that he was being stupid and scaring his daughter letting her down into the man hole . NO! The news media was being stupid ! Where the hell was people suppose to go to survive ? Everyone else was being stupid ! This man and his family may have been the only ones to survive ! I saw one grabbing their water , food and running to hide in the closet ! Really ??? That closet us going to save you girl ??? But the news media gave her better words than the man who really might have survived ! The reptilian media needs to be removed ! And people need to wake up and get back to common sense ! Should an attack occur now , I bet we would have more survivors than had it happened the day the alarm went off ! What a shame people have to be manipulated to do things to save their own lives ! We need to get off the trip of you hurt my feelings . OK show me which feelings was hurt ! Your feelings come from preprogrammed thoughts you have set up to tell you how you are to feel once something happens that you have chosen to determine certain lines have been crossed in your mind or actions against what you set to be boarders as to how your life  is to be lived . these feelings can be changed or reprogrammed ! But the doctors making money off of broken people will fight against anyone trying to disclose this truth ! A child living in a 3 ft cage all his or her life knows no better and that cage is home and security to that child . But put a child in that has not been there before and he or she  considers it a violation of their rights and a fit will take place . What’s the difference in these 2 children ? One has not been exposed to the news media and is satisfied with their cage as living quarters  . The other thinks it cruel to confine humans in such places . Preprogrammed feeling made one satisfied with their surroundings , the other was imposed on by what other persons ideas were ! The later is what we are living with today ! Political correctness ! Who the hell determined how everyone one else was supposed to think and feel ! Because we comply to their stupidness , doctors offices are full , drug stores are selling out of drugs and trying to find companies that can keep up with the demands ! We allow the representatives we sent to Washington to dictate to us what we are and what we are supposed to be doing ! We literally get lazey and allow them to think for us ! We become stupid ! Get a chance , go back and look at the news media videos of the people of Hawaii in fear and panic not knowing what to do ! The representatives are supposed to tell us what we need to do ! Yeah Bull Crap ! They have run to their holes dug with your tax dollars . Their life is worth more than yours ! Your life is about to take a turn for the worst and you need someone to tell you how to die or what to do ! Sound the alarm again ! Now watch to see people that finally got aholt of their feelings and put them in their pockets and is now taking action and has figured out what to do ! And the news media says this was cruel ? The people were made to think for themselves ! Why ? Because the Obama , NWO ass kissers did not dig holes big enough to hold all the people . Besides they think they are better than you are and didn’t want you in there with them . At least Trump has a heart and is trying to figure out how to get the people ready ! Because as the news video shows they sure had no idea what to do !
